overview: The first of our Lesbian Bridal Stories opens with Bree Daniels and Shyla Jennings sharing some champagne from Bree’s sister’s wedding and regaling each other with wedding tales. Bree shows Shyla some dresses and tries one on for her, eventually getting Shyla to try on the wedding dress. Once they’re all dressed up, they can’t keep their hands off of each other.  Next, Jelena Jensen and Malena Morgan are discussing Malena’s wedding the following day. Malena is having cold feet on account of her being a lesbian. Does she love her fiancé or is she in love with him? Jalena says she’s always there for her, in any way. Their mutual attraction takes over from there.  Scene 3 begins with a conversation about Jessie Rogers’mother marrying another woman. Then Jessie and Lily Carter dress up in the gown and tux and role-play that they’re they lucky couple. Jessie is a little nervous, but once they start kissing all the pieces start to fall into place.
title: Lesbian Bridal Stories 5
